duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the full life cycle of hardware asset management from planning to retirement.
Provision, prepare, clean, configure, or image hardware for new issue, break/fix, and refresh.
Ship, receive, track, and manage retirement of assets.
Ensure content accuracy and effective management of the hardware asset database.
Provide stock projections, maintain inventory counts, and request purchase of hardware and computer peripheral needs.
Coordinate and track the full life cycle of warranty repairs for hardware.
Maintain spare parts inventory and perform repairs as needed.
Submit workflows for assets ready for refresh.
Coordinate with internal stakeholders to report on asset dispositions and inventory.
Participate in testing new hardware and software as needed.
Assist with hardware and software releases and roll-outs.
Recommend new and updated hardware and software options.
Evaluate continuous improvement with IT asset management process and procedures.

education_certification.credential: 1-2 years working in an Information Technology field or relevant studies, internship or training. Experience working with desk phone and mobile device hardware preferred.
